details.description: No documentation exists describing the core StateMachine class and how to use it.
Critical lifecycle methods (registering states, starting the machine, performing transitions) were undocumented, leaving users unaware of required call order and behavior.
No guidance on checking whether a transition is allowed before attempting it.
Transition history output was undocumented, including event shape and use cases.
Hook registration and its invocation semantics were not described.
No documentation about resetting the machine state and clearing history.
Type definitions were present but not explained in the existing docs.
